name: Tele-squid
description:
Mini Game Jam submission.

You are a telekinetically gifted squid who is sent to get rid of some monsters running rampart in a dungeon. The dungeon is filled with treasure, but, since you're a squid, you have no use for it, besides using it to crush your enemies.

This squid also grew fond of the whales' songs, and so likes to move to the rhythm.

Used HUGE pixelart asset pack

Sounds made using Renoise and samples.
